parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in first_name, middle_name, last_name, and national_id

national_id.description: Must be exactly 14 digits and unique

phones.description: At least one phone is required. Phone numbers must be unique within request and globally.

national_id.description: Must be exactly 14 digits and unique (if provided)

address.description: Optional. If provided, address will be updated (if id matches) or created (if no id or id doesn't match).

id.description: Optional. Include to update existing address, omit to create new

phones.description: Optional. If provided, phones will be synced (missing phones deleted, new phones added, existing phones updated). Phone numbers must be unique within request and globally (excluding current client's phones).

id.description: Optional. Include to update existing phone, omit to create new

phone.description: Phone number (must be unique globally, excluding current client's phones)

parameters.description: Search in first_name, middle_name, last_name, and national_id

order_type.description: Order type determined from items. 'buy' if all items are buy, 'rent' if all are rent, 'tailoring' if all are tailoring, 'mixed' if multiple types, 'unknown' if no items

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

days_of_rent.description: Days of rent from pivot (only for rent type)

occasion_datetime.description: Occasion datetime from pivot (only for rent type). MySQL format: Y-m-d H:i:s

returnable.description: Whether the item can be returned (only for rent type items)

paid.description: Initial payment amount (optional). If provided, creates initial payment and updates order status automatically

visit_datetime.description: Visit datetime. MySQL datetime format: Y-m-d H:i:s

discount_type.description: Order-level discount type. If provided, discount_value must be > 0

discount_value.description: Order-level discount value. Required if discount_type is provided, must be > 0. If discount_type is percentage, value should be > 0 and <= 100. If fixed, value is the discount amount (decimal 10,2)

items.description: Order items. NOTE: Buy orders must have exactly 1 item of type 'buy'. Cannot mix buy with other types.

type.description: Item type. Buy orders: exactly 1 item allowed, no mixing with rent/tailoring

days_of_rent.description: Days of rent (required if type is rent)

occasion_datetime.description: Occasion datetime (required if type is rent). MySQL datetime format: Y-m-d H:i:s

delivery_date.description: Delivery date (required if type is rent). Format: Y-m-d

discount_type.description: Item-level discount type. If provided, discount_value must be > 0

discount_value.description: Item-level discount value. Required if discount_type is provided, must be > 0. If discount_type is percentage, value should be > 0 and <= 100. If fixed, value is the discount amount (decimal 10,2)

order_type.description: Order type determined from items. 'buy' if all items are buy, 'rent' if all are rent, 'tailoring' if all are tailoring, 'mixed' if multiple types, 'unknown' if no items

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

days_of_rent.description: Days of rent from pivot (only for rent type)

occasion_datetime.description: Occasion datetime from pivot (only for rent type). MySQL format: Y-m-d H:i:s

returnable.description: Whether the item can be returned (only for rent type items)

put.summary: Update an order. Note: Buy orders must have exactly 1 item of type 'buy' (no mixing). Fees are tracked separately and do not affect paid/remaining calculations.

post.summary: Add a payment to an order (Alias: Use POST /api/v1/payments instead)

payment_date.description: Payment date (defaults to now). MySQL format: Y-m-d H:i:s

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

post.summary: Mark a payment as paid (Alias: Use POST /api/v1/payments/{id}/pay instead)

payment_date.description: Payment date (defaults to now). MySQL format: Y-m-d H:i:s

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

422.description: Validation error or payment already paid/canceled

post.summary: Cancel a payment (Alias: Use POST /api/v1/payments/{id}/cancel instead)

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

422.description: Validation error or payment already canceled

parameters.description: Filter by user ID who created the payment

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

payment_date.description: Payment date (defaults to now). MySQL format: Y-m-d H:i:s

branch_id.description: Branch ID for cashbox transaction. If not provided, uses order's branch if available.

paid.description: Total amount paid (excludes fee payments - fees are tracked separately)

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)

transaction.description: The cashbox transaction created (if cashbox is available)

post.description: Cancel a payment. If the payment was already paid, any associated transaction will be reversed.

remaining.description: Remaining amount = total_price - paid (fees do not affect this calculation)
